name: What the Dog doin? (Dsinker11)
description:
Oh no! It looks like your owner has left to work once again!
You need to find them while going through the roofs, solving simple puzzles.
Controls:

Your default key movement on keyboard (means you can play on any keyboard layout) (usually WASD)

P - Enter DogVision (you can see colors better, but in b/w)

E - Interact with certain objects (they have a floating sphere above them)
